                     Appendix D: Internal Capture Worksheets 
                               




                                                                                     
                     ITE MULTI-USE PROJECT INTERNAL CAPTURE WORKSHEET
                     (Source: ITE Trip Generation Handbook , Second Edition, June 2004)
                                                                                                                                                                                            Project Number:    183.002
                                                                                                                                                                                              Project Name:    Chastain Apartments - Roswell Road
                                                                                                                                                                                                  Scenario:    Phase 2
                                                                                                                                                                                            Analysis Period:   Daily
                                                                                                                        Land Use A: Residential (Apartment)
                                                                                                                        ITE Land Use Code 220
                                                                                                                             Size: 400 DU
                                                                                                                                     Total      Internal    External
                                                                  Enter from External:    1,772                           Enter       2,183       411        1,772
                                                                      Exit to External:   1,846                            Exit       2,183       337        1,846
                                                                                                                          Total       4,366       748       3,618
                                                                  Demand      38.0%        830                             %          100%       17.1%      82.9%                            33.0%    720      Demand
                                                                  Balanced     337                                                                                                                     0       Balanced
                                                       Demand      9.0%        337                                                                                                                   11.0%        0       Demand
